nodes.bodyText:
JMRI has no control over screens; the Audio Table is in a window.
From the Apple Style Guide (linked to from Apple's notes to developers on help content): "Use [screen] to refer to what the user looks at while working on a computer or on iPad, iPhone, iPod, or Apple Watch. Don’t use display when you mean screen. On a portable computer or an all-in-one computer, the display is the LCD or CRT device. The screen is the surface the user views."
From Microsoft's Glossary: "A [window is a] rectangular area on a computer screen in which programs and content appear. A window can be moved, resized, minimized, or closed; it can overlap other windows."

nodes.bodyText: Done.  Thanks for reading - and helping me make corrections and improvements rather than introducing errors!  Jerry
